resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108545</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108545</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212195</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound, Physics and Music</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton, Physik und Musik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bruit, physique et musique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Som, física e música</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suono, fisica e musica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήχος, φυσική και μουσική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sonido, física y música</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For middle school and up, a short course that explains acoustics (the physics of sound waves) as it relates to music and musical instruments. Suggestions for presenting some of the concepts to younger students are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für mittlere Schule und up, ein kurzer Kurs, der 
Akustik erklärt (die Physik der Schallwellen) wie sie auf Musik- und 
Musikalinstrumenten in Verbindung steht. Vorschläge für das 
Darstellen einige der Konzepte jüngeren Kursteilnehmern sind 
enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour le collège et levez, un cours court qui 
explique l'acoustique (la physique des vagues saines) comme elle 
associe aux instruments de musique et de musical. Les 
suggestions pour présenter certains des concepts à de plus jeunes 
étudiants sont incluses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para a escola média e levante, um curso curto que
explique a acústica (a física de ondas sadias) como se relaciona aos
instrumentos da música e do musical. As sugestões para 
apresentar alguns dos conceitos a uns estudantes mais novos são 
incluídas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la scuola centrale ed aumenti, un corso corto 
che spiega l'acustica (fisica delle onde sonore) come si riferisce 
agli strumenti di musical e di musica. I suggerimenti per 
presentare alcuni dei concetti agli allievi più giovani sono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για τη δευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση και επάνω, μια σύντομη
σειρά μαθημάτων που εξηγεί την ακουστική (η φυσική των υγιών 
κυμάτων) όπως αφορά τη μουσική και τα μουσικά όργανα. Οι 
προτάσεις για μερικών από τις έννοιες στους νεώτερους σπουδαστές
συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para la escuela media y suba, un curso corto que 
explique la acústica (la física de ondas acústicas) como se 
relaciona con los instrumentos de la música y del musical. Las 
sugerencias para presentar algunos de los conceptos a estudiantes más
jóvenes son incluidas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108545</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/sound-physics-and-music</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
